name: Palladium: A Precursor to The Last One-Horn
name_original: Palladium: A Precursor to The Last One-Horn
description:
Palladium is an interactive fiction game about a cyborg activist, Anámesa, who must find a missing girl, Mazi, kidnapped by poachers in a future Cape Town, South Africa.

“The sticky stuff between the circuits, what some of us still called life, was the cheapest of commodities. It didn’t mean anything, especially next to the crypto value of Cerium or Palladium.”

This is the first of a triptych of games in The Last One-Horn cyberpunk narrative universe.

It's recommended that you play the game in FULL SCREEN.

If audio does not work in Chrome, try Safari, Explorer, or Firefox web browsers.

More from this developer: https://johnvanderhoef.itch.io
